item.title: Using the missingno Python library to Identify and Visualise Missing Data Prior to Machine Learning
item.description: Data exploration and pre-processing are important steps within any data science or machine learning workflow. When working on tutorial or training datasets it can be the case that they have been engineered in a way to make it easy to work with and allow the algorithm being discussed to be run successfully.
